title: Nurses' perspectives on privacy and ethical concerns regarding artificial intelligence adoption in healthcare
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Moustaq Karim Khan Rony, Sharker Md. Numan, Khadiza Akter, Hasanuzzaman Tushar, Mitun Debnath, Fateha tuj Johra, Fazila Akter, Sujit Mondal, Mousumi Das, Muhammad Join Uddin, Jeni Begum, Mst. Rina Parvin
